leadingComments.value:
*
         * Creates attribute tags html to be added to this button 
         * inputs.
         * @type {Class}

*
     * Takes the settings for the buttons, a class that renders the 
     * error messages and a class that renders attributes. 
     * 
     * @param {Object} buttonsInfo - Information to create this button input 
     * @param {Array} buttonsInfo.buttons - each individual button data and settings.
     * @param {Object} buttonsInfo.settings - settings for all buttons 
     * @param {Class} buttonsInfo.errors - an error class that was created by the 
     * rendering library so the errors open and display alongside the library.

assert(typeof attributes === 'object', 'buttonsInfo.settings', `${attributes} is not an object`);

leadingComments.value: assert(typeof attributes === 'object', 'buttonsInfo.settings', `${attributes} is not an object`);

assert(!typeCheck.isEmpty(labelHTML), 'buttonsInfo.labelHTML', `${labelHTML} is empty.`);

assert(typeCheck.isString(label), 'buttonsInfo.label', `${label} is not a string.`);
assert(typeCheck.isString(labelHTML), 'buttonsInfo.labelHTML', `${labelHTML} is not a string.`);
assert(typeCheck.isString(label), `buttonsInfo.button[${index}].label`, `${label} is not a string.`);
assert(typeCheck.isString(attrHTML), `buttonsInfo.button[${index}].label`, `${attrHTML} is not a string.`);

comments.value:
*
 * Renders a collection of buttons for one click recording of 
 * an input that has multiple options for data recording.

*
     * Takes the settings for the buttons, a class that renders the 
     * error messages and a class that renders attributes. 
     * 
     * @param {Object} buttonsInfo - Information to create this button input 
     * @param {Array} buttonsInfo.buttons - each individual button data and settings.
     * @param {Object} buttonsInfo.settings - settings for all buttons 
     * @param {Class} buttonsInfo.errors - an error class that was created by the 
     * rendering library so the errors open and display alongside the library.

*
         * Error message class that will take the errors from 
         * the rendering library and adds them to this input 
         * @type {Class}

*
         * Creates attribute tags html to be added to this button 
         * inputs.
         * @type {Class}

*
     * Lets users add the same classes to all buttons just in 
     * case buttons share a specific class.
     * 
     * @type {String}

* * Creates the HTML for every buttons defined in the buttons array and * attaches the error messages attached to this input. * * @example * buttonClasses = 'button-class'; * buttons = [{ * label : "Button 1", * attrHTML : "disabled", * classes : "class-1" * },{ * label : "

Button 2

", * classes " class-2" * }]; * * // Will render: * * * * * @type {String}
assert(typeof attributes === 'object', 'buttonsInfo.settings', `${attributes} is not an object`);
assert(typeof errors === 'object', 'buttonsInfo.settings', `${errors} is not an object`);
assert(typeof messages === 'object', 'buttonsInfo.settings', `${messages} is not an object`);
